title: Pixel 4A (5g) assistant voice does not work when I say hey google. Media volume is turned on.
content: Trying to use my google assistant. When I say hey google I get a text response. I've made sure the sound is turned up, I've asked my assistant directly why her voice doesn't work - ironically that's the only time her voice does work - when she answers that question. Anything else, is just text.
